pages.text: $(li)The Deep Lukewarm Ocean is a variant of the Lukewarm Ocean biome that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The terrain of this place is composed mainly by Sand blocks. $(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation too, like Seagrass or Kelp Plants.

$(li)Some aquatic animals like Dolphins, Squids, Cods, Pufferfishes, Tropical Fishes, Frilled Sharks and Hammerhead Sharks can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Deep Lukewarm Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
